name: G16-Dad Otaku Cream, Mom Beard
bio: *hissing noises*! I'm G16-Dad Otaku Cream, Mom Beard. I want to live in a world where people believe that one day cats will rule this planet. Sometimes I daydream of a life full of grooming, chocolate, and volunteering at the local kitten rescue shelter. Purrhaps this is the beginning of a beautiful relationship.
